name: obsidian-protocol
description: Universal credit infrastructure for humans and AI agents on Solana

scripts.build: pnpm run build:anchor && pnpm run sync-idl && pnpm run build:app
scripts.sync-idl: mkdir -p packages/app/src/idl && cp packages/anchor/target/idl/*.json packages/app/src/idl/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run build:anchor && pnpm run sync-idl
